# deps/skia/src/utils

set(SKIA_UTILS_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/utils")
# set(SKIA_UTILS_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/utils")

file(GLOB SKIA_UTILS_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_UTILS_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_UTILS_SOURCES "${SKIA_UTILS_DIR}/*.cpp")
# file(GLOB SKIA_UTILS_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_UTILS_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

# list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_UTILS_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_UTILS_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_UTILS_SOURCES})

# set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
